description.content:
Start a new Card, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay or STC Pay payment.
The `source` object will define what payment is started.

When a payment is started, the status will be one of:
- `initiated`
- `paid`
- `failed`

If the payment is `initiated` then you need to complete the payment transaction by completing the payment
challenge found in `source.transaction_url` depending on the payment source type.

response.name: Successful operation
response.body:
{
  "id": "<uuid>",
  "status": "initiated",
  "amount": "<integer>",
  "fee": "<integer>",
  "currency": {
    "value": "reference ./common/types.yaml#/components/schemas/Currency not found in the OpenAPI spec"
  },
  "refunded": "<integer>",
  "captured": "<integer>",
  "amount_format": "<string>",
  "fee_format": "<string>",
  "refunded_format": "<string>",
  "captured_format": "<string>",
  "ip": "<uuid>",
  "created_at": "<string>",
  "updated_at": "<string>",
  "source": {
    "value": "reference ./common/sources/card.yaml#/components/schemas/CreditCardResponse not found in the OpenAPI spec"
  },
  "refunded_at": "<string>",
  "captured_at": "<string>",
  "voided_at": "<string>",
  "description": "<string>",
  "invoice_id": "<uuid>",
  "callback_url": "<uri>",
  "metadata": {
    "value": "reference ./common/types.yaml#/components/schemas/Metadata not found in the OpenAPI spec"
  }
}

response.name: Business Error or validation error.
Invalid authorization credentials
Invalid authorization credentials

description.content: Page to list
Payment ID to look for
Status to filter by
Filter payments equal or greater than a give date
Filter payments equal or less than a give date
Filter payments updated on a given date or later
Filter payments updated on a given date or prior
Filter invoices by a given metadata `key`. You need to change in the key in the square brackets.

Filter payments by card last digits.
Only available for scheme payments: `creditcard`, `applepay`, `samsungpay`.
Filter payments by RRN or retreival reference number.
